posts.post_content:
Does anybody have any T205 Sovereigns to trade/sell?  Let me know if you want to look at my dupes list, or send a price...

Take Care,
Geno

It's been over a month so I thought I'd rebait the hook and throw it back out there.  Last time, I picked up a couple from N54ers - anybody else?  I'm trying to confirm the Neal Ball card as well, so if you have one I'd love to see a scan of a Ball/Sovereign card!

Take Care,
Geno
